segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar like he’s on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly, and he’s stretching so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he’s going to tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is, like this happens all the time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out of the sink, and it’s getting deeper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a slow-motion disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t even care about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is just as guilty for encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR
